roleset.name: put into a specific mental state (us. excitement or gullibility)

role.descr: entity whose mental state is affected

example.name: Rare transitive.
example.text: Of course I psyched him by telling him that nobody serves crumpets with mascarpone ( oh , heaven ! ) and blueberry preserves .

propbank.arg: by telling him that nobody serves crumpets with mascarpone ( oh , heaven ! ) and blueberry preserves

example.name: passive, args 1 and 2
example.text: I really tried to get psyched myself to do it

example.name: Adjectival rel: psyched
example.text: We 're super psyched about the new " Add to foursquare " button that The Wall Street Journal is rolling out today !

propbank.arg: about the new " Add to foursquare " button that The Wall Street Journal is rolling out today

roleset.note: PSYCH-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on Call Home; adjectival 'psyched' based on BOLT-4,5. No VNcls. (from psych.01-v)
PSYCHED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from psyched.01-j)
